steps.text: Whisk flour, milk, and egg until smooth.
Heat a pan, pour batter, cook both sides until golden.
Cook pasta in salted water.
Sauté garlic in butter, toss pasta, season to taste.
Beat eggs and scramble halfway; remove.
Stir-fry tomatoes, return eggs, season and finish.
Taste and adjust seasoning to your preference.
Heat oil and sauté vegetables.
Add rice and soy sauce; stir-fry until hot.
Cook chicken, toss with BBQ sauce.
Fill tortillas and wrap.
Toast bread.
Mash avocado, season, spread on toast.
Taste and adjust seasoning to your preference.
Sauté onion and carrot.
Add lentils and water; simmer until tender.
Season salmon with oil, salt, and lemon.
Bake at 200°C / 400°F for 12–15 minutes.
Taste and adjust seasoning to your preference.
Mix all ingredients in a mug.
Microwave 60–90 seconds until set.
Taste and adjust seasoning to your preference.
Chop ingredients and toss with olive oil and vinegar.
